Practice Name: Least Privilege Employ least privilege principles

Description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions
Limit number of concurrent sessions per user
Prevent further access after a period of inactivity
Protect remote access for privileged functions
Route remote access via controlled access points
Create audit logs for required events
Protect audit records from unauthorized access
Report incidents in a timely manner
Protect and limit access to media
Protect and control access to facilities
